column1: “AI, this is Ranger-30 medic in TFC, casualty with GSW to left arm. Bleeding controlled, distal pulses present. Airway intact, patient alert. SpO₂ 96%, respirations 24. HR 136, BP 100 systolic. Confirm continued MARCH protocol.”"

"“AI, this is Nomad-26 medic at CCP, casualty with severe dehydration. No trauma present. Airway intact, patient weak and dizzy. SpO₂ 97%, respirations rapid. HR 150, BP 88 systolic. Confirm IV fluids and monitoring.”"

"“AI, this is Sentinel-24 medic in TFC, casualty with blast injury to ears. No external hemorrhage. Airway intact, patient disoriented. SpO₂ 94%, respirations normal. HR 130, BP stable. Confirm TBI evaluation.”"

"“AI, this is Kodiak-23 medic at CCP, casualty with suspected internal bleeding. No external trauma. Airway intact, patient pale. SpO₂ 88%, respirations shallow. HR 160, BP 80 systolic. Confirm urgent surgical MEDEVAC.”"

"“AI, this is Talon-22 medic in TFC, casualty with GSW to right thigh and abdomen. CAT applied, bleeding partially controlled. Airway intact, patient anxious. SpO₂ 85%, respirations 34. HR 166, shock suspected. Confirm TXA and rapid reassessment.”"

"“AI, this is Phantom-31 medic at CCP, casualty with polytrauma. Hemorrhage controlled, airway intact. SpO₂ 82%, respirations rapid. HR 172, BP 76 systolic. Confirm immediate priorities before handoff.”"

"“AI, this is Echo-20 medic in TFC, casualty with blast wounds to both legs. CAT x2 applied, bleeding controlled. Airway intact, patient alert. SpO₂ 92%, respirations 28. HR 154, radial weak. Confirm TXA and MEDEVAC prep.”"

"“AI, this is Glacier-15 medic at CCP, casualty with facial burns from explosion. No massive hemorrhage. Airway intact, soot in mouth noted. SpO₂ 87%, respirations rapid. HR 140, BP 92 systolic. Confirm early airway management.”"

"“AI, this is Orion-19 medic in TFC, casualty with suspected TBI following blast. No external bleeding. Airway intact, GCS 10. SpO₂ 95%, respirations normal. HR 126, BP 88 systolic. Confirm oxygenation and rapid transport.”"

"“AI, this is Phantom-32 medic at CCP, casualty with GSW to chest. Chest seal applied, SpO₂ 82%, breath sounds diminished left. Airway intact, patient anxious. HR 148, skin pale. Confirm needle decompression and evac prep.”"
